title: so any Transfer Service Update 2018? 6 weeks has passed

embed.description: In a few weeks, we'll start flagging accounts to claim their rewards once preseason kicks off in November. To ensure players don't miss out on their preseason rewards by transferring servers, we're going to disable them until November 20.

replies.body: Unfortunately we don't have a solid date yet, but we hear that the fix is making headway. We hope that we can get an update on it asap 'cuz we know a lot of you have been stuck for a while without em. Keep an eye on [**the status page**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) for more news and updates going forward!

So the Status page says "We know quite a few of you were expecting Server Transfers to come back online this week. Unfortunately we ran into some issues on how our data centers communicate to each other, and it will take at least 5 to 6 weeks to be fixed." This was stated 23. November 2017.
Today its 19. January 2018 - 8 Weeks later... Still not working?..
